title: patch 7.17
body: i can log into my game but when i log in to finish the update it comes up with a message that says error code 003 does anyone know how i can fix this?

replies.body: I'm seeing a good number of players running into this 003 issue, and so far the usual force repatch hasn't seemed to be the fix this time. Let's try a bit of a different approach by using that [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall**. Let me know how that works!
